<li id="cite_note-10"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-10">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1"><a class="external text" href="http://hdr.undp.org/sites/default/files/hdr2020.pdf" rel="nofollow"><i>Human Development Report 2020 The Next Frontier: Human Development and the Anthropocene</i></a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. <i>hdr.undp.org</i>. United Nations Development Programme. 15 December 2020. pp. 343–346. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-9-211-26442-5" title="Special:BookSources/978-9-211-26442-5"><bdi>978-9-211-26442-5</bdi></a>. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20201215063955/http://hdr.undp.org/sites/default/files/hdr2020.pdf" rel="nofollow">Archived</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span> from the original on 15 December 2020<span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-Brindley_2015_p27-14"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-Brindley_2015_p27_14-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-Brindley_2015_p27_14-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFBrindley2015">Brindley, Erica Fox (2015). <i>Ancient China and the Yue Perceptions and Identities on the Southern Frontier, c.400 BCE–50 CE</i>. Cambridge University Press. p. 27. <q>The term “Yue” survives today in the name of the Vietnamese state (yue nan 越南, or, “Viet south” – “Viet of the South,” – as the Vietnamese likely took it; or “South of the Viet” – as the Chinese likely took it</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Ancient+China+and+the+Yue+Perceptions+and+Identities+on+the+Southern+Frontier%2C+c.400+BCE%E2%80%9350+CE&amp;rft.pages=27&amp;rft.pub=Cambridge+University+Press&amp;rft.date=2015&amp;rft.aulast=Brindley&amp;rft.aufirst=Erica+Fox&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AVietnam"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-census-407"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-census_407-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFGeneral_Statistics_Office2019"><a href="/wiki/General_Statistics_Office_of_Vietnam" title="General Statistics Office of Vietnam">General Statistics Office</a> (2019). <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210110045640/https://www.gso.gov.vn/du-lieu-va-so-lieu-thong-ke/2020/11/ket-qua-toan-bo-tong-dieu-tra-dan-so-va-nha-o-nam-2019/" rel="nofollow"><i>Kết quả Toàn bộ Tổng điều tra dân số và nhà ở năm 2019 (Completed Results of the 2019 Viet Nam Population and Housing Census)</i></a>. <li id="cite_note-NQ1111-408"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-NQ1111_408-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://thuvienphapluat.vn/van-ban/Bo-may-hanh-chinh/Nghi-quyet-1111-NQ-UBTVQH14-2020-sap-xep-don-vi-hanh-chinh-cap-huyen-cap-xa-Ho-Chi-Minh-460049.aspx" rel="nofollow">"Nghị quyết số 1111/NQ-UBTVQH14 năm 2020 về việc sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp huyện, cấp xã và thành lập thành phố Thủ Đức thuộc Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh"</a>. 9 December 2020. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210109133405/https://thuvienphapluat.vn/van-ban/Bo-may-hanh-chinh/Nghi-quyet-1111-NQ-UBTVQH14-2020-sap-xep-don-vi-hanh-chinh-cap-huyen-cap-xa-Ho-Chi-Minh-460049.aspx" rel="nofollow">Archived</a> from the original on 9 January 2021<span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-NQ1264-409"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-NQ1264_409-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://thuvienphapluat.vn/van-ban/Bo-may-hanh-chinh/Nghi-quyet-1264-NQ-UBTVQH14-2021-dieu-chinh-dia-gioi-hanh-chinh-cap-huyen-Thua-Thien-Hue-473372.aspx" rel="nofollow">"Nghị quyết số 1264/NQ-UBTVQH14 năm 2021 về việc điều chỉnh địa giới hành chính các đơn vị hành chính cấp huyện và sắp xếp, thành lập các phường thuộc thành phố Huế, tỉnh Thừa Thiên Huế"</a>. 27 April 2021. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210520031823/https://thuvienphapluat.vn/van-ban/Bo-may-hanh-chinh/Nghi-quyet-1264-NQ-UBTVQH14-2021-dieu-chinh-dia-gioi-hanh-chinh-cap-huyen-Thua-Thien-Hue-473372.aspx" rel="nofollow">Archived</a> from the original on 20 May 2021<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">23 July</span> 2021</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=Ngh%E1%BB%8B+quy%E1%BA%BFt+s%E1%BB%91+1264%2FNQ-UBTVQH14+n%C4%83m+2021+v%E1%BB%81+vi%E1%BB%87c+%C4%91i%E1%BB%81u+ch%E1%BB%89nh+%C4%91%E1%BB%8Ba+gi%E1%BB%9Bi+h%C3%A0nh+ch%C3%ADnh+c%C3%A1c+%C4%91%C6%A1n+v%E1%BB%8B+h%C3%A0nh+ch%C3%ADnh+c%E1%BA%A5p+huy%E1%BB%87n+v%C3%A0+s%E1%BA%AFp+x%E1%BA%BFp%2C+th%C3%A0nh+l%E1%BA%ADp+c%C3%A1c+ph%C6%B0%E1%BB%9Dng+thu%E1%BB%99c+th%C3%A0nh+ph%E1%BB%91+Hu%E1%BA%BF%2C+t%E1%BB%89nh+Th%E1%BB%ABa+Thi%C3%AAn+Hu%E1%BA%BF&amp;rft.date=2021-04-27&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fthuvienphapluat.vn%2Fvan-ban%2FBo-may-hanh-chinh%2FNghi-quyet-1264-NQ-UBTVQH14-2021-dieu-chinh-dia-gioi-hanh-chinh-cap-huyen-Thua-Thien-Hue-473372.aspx&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AVietnam"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-NQ857-410"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-NQ857_410-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-NQ857_410-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://thuvienphapluat.vn/van-ban/bo-may-hanh-chinh/Nghi-quyet-857-NQ-UBTVQH14-2020-thanh-lap-thanh-pho-Di-An-thanh-pho-Thuan-An-tinh-Binh-Duong-433886.aspx" rel="nofollow">"Nghị quyết số 857/NQ-UBTVQH14 năm 2020 về việc thành lập thành phố Dĩ An, thành phố Thuận An và các phường thuộc thị xã Tân Uyên, tỉnh Bình Dương"</a>. 10 January 2020. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210422031125/https://thuvienphapluat.vn/van-ban/bo-may-hanh-chinh/Nghi-quyet-857-NQ-UBTVQH14-2020-thanh-lap-thanh-pho-Di-An-thanh-pho-Thuan-An-tinh-Binh-Duong-433886.aspx" rel="nofollow">Archived</a> from the original on 22 April 2021<span class="reference-accessdate">. <h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Legislation_and_government_source">Legislation and government source</span></h3>

<ul><li><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFConstitution_of_Vietnam1992">Constitution of Vietnam (1992). <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20181013071327/http://www.moj.gov.vn/vbpq/en/lists/vn%20bn%20php%20lut/view_detail.aspx?itemid=10450" rel="nofollow">"Constitution [Chapter Five: Fundamental Rights and Duties of the Citizen]"</a>. <a href="/wiki/Ministry_of_Justice_(Vietnam)" title="Ministry of Justice (Vietnam)">Ministry of Justice (Vietnam)</a>. <li><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFUnited_States_Agency_for_International_Development2018">United States Agency for International Development (3 December 2018). <a class="external text" href="https://www.usaid.gov/vietnam/environmental-remediation" rel="nofollow">"Environmental Remediation [Agent Orange]"</a>. <a href="/wiki/United_States_Agency_for_International_Development" title="United States Agency for International Development">United States Agency for International Development</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.atitle=Environmental+Remediation+%5BAgent+Orange%5D&amp;rft.date=2018-12-03&amp;rft.au=United+States+Agency+for+International+Development&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.usaid.gov%2Fvietnam%2Fenvironmental-remediation&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AVietnam"></span> <span class="cs1-hidden-error citation-comment"><code class="cs1-code">{{<a href="/wiki/Template:Cite_journal" title="Template:Cite journal">cite journal</a>}}</code>: </span><span class="cs1-hidden-error citation-comment">Cite journal requires <code class="cs1-code">|journal=</code> (<a href="/wiki/Help:CS1_errors#missing_periodical" title="Help:CS1 errors">help</a>)</span></li>
<li><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1 cs1-prop-foreign-lang-source" id="CITEREFVietnam_Ministry_of_Foreign_Affairs">Vietnam Ministry of Foreign Affairs. <a class="external text" href="http://www.mofahcm.gov.vn/en/mofa/cn_vakv/ca_tbd/nr040819104054/ns150602164120" rel="nofollow">"Tài Liệu Cơ Bản Nước Cộng Hoà Hồi Giáo Pa-kít-xtan"</a> (in Vietnamese). <li><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFMontagnard_Human_Rights_Organisation">Montagnard Human Rights Organisation. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20121006164804/http://www.mhro.org/montangards-history/under-south-vietnam-rule" rel="nofollow">"Under South Vietnam Rule (1955–1975)"</a>. Montagnard Human Rights Organization. <li><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFReporters_Without_Borders">Reporters Without Borders. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20110317075418/http://en.rsf.org/internet-enemie-vietnam,39763.html" rel="nofollow">"Internet Enemies [Vietnam]"</a>. <a href="/wiki/Reporters_Without_Borders" title="Reporters Without Borders">Reporters Without Borders</a>. <li><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFThi_Anh">Thi Anh, Do. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20181010120818/https://www.adpc.net/igo/contents/iPrepare/iprepare-news_id.asp?ipid=223" rel="nofollow">"Flood in Vietnam"</a>. Asian Disaster Preparedness Center. UNESCO.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=UNESCO+Science+Report%3A+towards+2030&amp;rft.pub=UNESCO&amp;rft.au=UNESCO+Publishing&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Funesdoc.unesco.org%2Fimages%2F0023%2F002354%2F235406e.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AVietnam"></span></li>

United Nations Treaty Collection.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=Treaty+on+the+Prohibition+of+Nuclear+Weapons+%5BVietnam%5D&amp;rft.pub=United+Nations+Treaty+Collection&amp;rft.au=United+Nations+Treaty+Collection&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Ftreaties.un.org%2FPages%2FViewDetails.aspx%3Fsrc%3DTREATY%26mtdsg_no%3DXXVI-9%26chapter%3D26%26clang%3D_en&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AVietnam"></span></li>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Free_content">Free content</span></h3>
<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1054258005" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="refbegin" style="">
<p><a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Definition_of_Free_Cultural_Works_logo_notext.svg"><img alt="Definition of Free Cultural Works logo notext.svg" class="noviewer" data-file-height="218" data-file-width="219" decoding="async" height="12" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Definition_of_Free_Cultural_Works_logo_notext.svg/12px-Definition_of_Free_Cultural_Works_logo_notext.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Definition_of_Free_Cultural_Works_logo_notext.svg/18px-Definition_of_Free_Cultural_Works_logo_notext.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Definition_of_Free_Cultural_Works_logo_notext.svg/24px-Definition_of_Free_Cultural_Works_logo_notext.svg.png 2x" width="12"/></a> This article incorporates text from a <a href="/wiki/Free_content" title="Free content">free content</a> work. <ul><li>Robert N. Wilkey. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20120719190536/http://www.jcil.org/journal/articles/160.html" rel="nofollow">"Vietnam's Antitrust Legislation and Subscription to E-ASEAN: An End to the Bamboo Firewall Over Internet Regulation?"</a> <i>The John Marshall Journal of Computer and Information Law</i>. </div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%"><div style="display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2em; padding: .1em 0;"><a href="/wiki/Dependent_territory" title="Dependent territory">Dependent<br/>territories</a></div></th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em"></div><table class="nowraplinks navbox-subgroup" style="border-spacing:0"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%">Australia</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Christmas_Island" title="Christmas Island">Christmas Island</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Cocos_(Keeling)_Islands" title="Cocos (Keeling) Islands">Cocos (Keeling) Islands</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%">United Kingdom</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Akrotiri_and_Dhekelia" title="Akrotiri and Dhekelia">Akrotiri and Dhekelia</a><sup>2</sup> (Sovereign Base Areas)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/British_Indian_Ocean_Territory" title="British Indian Ocean Territory">British Indian Ocean Territory</a> (<a href="/wiki/British_Overseas_Territories" title="British Overseas Territories">British Overseas Territory</a>)</li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table><div></div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%"><div style="display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2em; padding: .1em 0;"><a href="/wiki/Special_administrative_regions_of_China" title="Special administrative regions of China">Special administrative<br/>regions of China</a></div></th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

</div></td></tr><tr><td class="navbox-abovebelow" colspan="3"><div><div class="hlist hlist-separated"><ul><li><sup>1</sup> Spans the conventional boundary between Europe and another continent.</li><li><sup>2</sup> Considered European for cultural, political and historical reasons but is geographically in Western Asia.</li></ul></div>
<ul><li><img alt="" class="noviewer" data-file-height="185" data-file-width="180" decoding="async" height="16" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/96/Symbol_category_class.svg/16px-Symbol_category_class.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/96/Symbol_category_class.svg/23px-Symbol_category_class.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/9/96/Symbol_category_class.svg/31px-Symbol_category_class.svg.png 2x" title="Category" width="16"/> <b><a href="/wiki/Category:Asia" title="Category:Asia">Category</a></b></li>

with NLA identifiers</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Category:Articles_with_SELIBR_identifiers" title="Category:Articles with SELIBR identifiers">Articles with SELIBR identifiers</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Category:Articles_with_FAST_identifiers" title="Category:Articles with FAST identifiers">Articles with FAST identifiers</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Category:Articles_with_HDS_identifiers" title="Category:Articles with HDS identifiers">Articles with HDS identifiers</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Category:Articles_with_MusicBrainz_area_identifiers" title="Category:Articles with MusicBrainz area identifiers">Articles with MusicBrainz area identifiers</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Category:Articles_with_NARA_identifiers" title="Category:Articles with NARA identifiers">Articles with NARA
